Date;return"UHID|"+e.getUTCFullYear().toString().substr(2,2)+":"+a(e.getUTCMonth()+1,2)+":"+a(e.getUTCDate(),2)+":"+a(e.getUTCHours(),2)+":"+a(e.getUTCMinutes(),2)+":"+a(e.getUTCSeconds(),2)+":"+a(e.getUTCMilliseconds(),3)+"_"+function e(t){return t?(t^16*Math.random()>>t/4).toString(16):([1e7]+-1e3+-4e3+-8e3+-1e11).replace(/[018]/g,e)}()}},{}]},{},[5]);
//# sourceMappingURL=chameleon-analytics.min.js.map
  </script>
  <noscript>
   <iframe height="0" src="https://www.googletagmanager.com/ns.html?id=GTM-M3TH25P" style="display:none;visibility:hidden;" width="0">
   </iframe>
  </noscript>

      </a>
     </figure>
     <figure class="desktop section-theme-border" data-mod="image">
      <a href="https://www.mirror.co.uk/news/uk-news/couple-2-babies-11-months-23768146">
       <img alt="" content="https://i2-prod.mirror.co.uk/incoming/article23769194.ece/ALTERNATES/s615/0_JS231030038bann.jpg" data-src="https://i2-prod.mirror.co.uk/incoming/article23769194.ece/ALTERNATES/s615/0_JS231030038bann.jpg" data-srcset="https://i2-prod.mirror.co.uk/incoming/article23769194.ece/ALTERNATES/s508/0_JS231030038bann.jpg 508w, https://i2-prod.mirror.co.uk/incoming/article23769194.ece/ALTERNATES/s810/0_JS231030038bann.jpg 810w, https://i2-prod.mirror.co.uk/incoming/article23769194.ece/ALTERNATES/s1176b/0_JS231030038bann.jpg 1176w" src="/@trinitymirrordigital/marwood/TM/img/placeholders/transparent-wide.png"/>
      </a>
     </figure>
     <a class="headline publication-font" data-link-tracking="" href="https://www.mirror.co.uk/news/uk-news/couple-2-babies-11-months-23768146">
      "We were petrified - now we're so happy": Couple welcome two babies just 11 months apart in lockdown as they become family-of-four
     </a>
     <div class="comments-count">
      <a aria-label="Comments for &quot;We were petrified - now we're so happy&quot;: Couple welcome two babies just 11 months apart in lockdown as they become family-of-four" class="viafoura" href="https://www.mirror.co.uk/news/uk-news/couple-2-babies-11-months-23768146#comments-section">

   <div class="pancake use-image-placeholders duet social secondary channel-ece_frontpage" data-group="featuredStories" data-group-index="1">

       Researchers at the University of Arizona found coronavirus spread quickly within China due to packed conditions of the Huanan seafood market and a 'lucky break or two'
      </a>
     </div>
    </div>

    <div class="teaser teaser-highlight teaser-prominent">
     <figure class="section-theme-border" data-mod="image">
      <a aria-label="Fit and healthy single mum-of-seven dies suddenly in her sleep aged just 34 - leaving her devastated kids searching for answers" data-link-tracking="" href="https://www.mirror.co.uk/news/uk-news/single-mum-seven-34-dies-23767053">

   <div class="pancake use-image-placeholders duet primary channel-ece_frontpage" data-group="topStories" data-group-index="13">

    <div class="teaser">

   var publicSectionParams = window.TMCONFIG.publicSectionParams;
var environment = 'digitalData.page.attributes.environment'.split('.').reduce(function(acc,cur) { return acc && acc[cur] || undefined; }, window);
if (environment === 'prod' && publicSectionParams['hotjar.hjid']) {
(function(h,o,t,j,a,r){

{(h.hj.q=h.hj.q||[]).push(arguments)}
;
h._hjSettings={hjid:publicSectionParams['hotjar.hjid'],hjsv:6};
a=o.getElementsByTagName('head')[0];
r=o.createElement('script');r.async=1;
r.src=t+h._hjSettings.hjid+j+h._hjSettings.hjsv;

  <script>
   window.console.log("iPhone/Edge Fix running...");
(function (doc) {
var agnt = navigator.userAgent;
var css = ".captify-widget>div>div>div{padding-bottom:30px!important}";
var count = 300; // 300 * 100ms == 30000ms limit
function isIphone() {
return /iPhone/.test(agnt);
}
function isEdge() {
return /Edge/.test(agnt);
}
function isEdgeOrIphone() {
return isIphone() || isEdge();
}
function applyFix() {
var ifr = doc.querySelector(".captify-iframe");
if (ifr && isEdge(agnt)) {
fixEdge(ifr);
} else if (ifr && ifr.contentDocument && ifr.contentDocument.head && isIphone(agnt)) {
fixIphone(ifr.contentDocument);
} else {
count--;
if (count) {
setTimeout(applyFix, 100);
}
}
}
function fixIphone(doc) {
var styleTag = doc.createElement("style");
styleTag.type = "text/css";
styleTag.appendChild(doc.createTextNode(css));
styleTag.cssText = doc.head.appendChild(styleTag);
}
function fixEdge(ifr) {
if (ifr.contentDocument && ifr.contentDocument.childNodes && ifr.contentDocument.childNodes.length) {
//finished
} else {
ifr.classList.add("hidden");
count = 100; // 100 * 50ms == 5000ms limit
setTimeout(unhideEdge, 50, ifr);
}
}
function unhideEdge(ifr){
if (ifr.contentDocument && ifr.contentDocument.childNodes && ifr.contentDocument.childNodes.length) {
ifr.classList.remove("hidden");
} else {
count--;
if (count) {
setTimeout(unhideEdge, 50, ifr);
}
}
}
if (isEdgeOrIphone()) {
applyFix();
}
})(document);
  </script>

}, 3000);
});
  </script>
